name: TELSTAR 28
notes:
An entirely new TELSTAR model (2003). The floats fold in, not only for road transport but also for mooring where space is restricted. Double-hinged beams swivel the amas alongside the main hull, reducing the beam from 16 ft (4.8 m) to 8.5 ft (2.6 m) without extending the boat's overall length.

Performance Cruising Inc.
7364 Edgewood Road
Annapolis,Maryland 21403
